item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row css=".vc_custom_1502049541055{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_custom_heading text="If you not find your question send me email : your_company@store.com" font_container="tag:div|font_size:25|text_align:left|color:%23222222" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]If you not find your question you just send me email : yourcompany@demo.com .Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur non porttitor diam. Sed sit amet luctus turpis. Curabitur nec diam libero. Vivamus fringilla purus eget lacus placerat,[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1502049551492{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][vc_tta_accordion style="modern" shape="square" color="white" spacing="3" gap="3" c_position="right" active_section="1" no_fill="true"][vc_tta_section title="What is a fulfillment address?" tab_id="1502047711440-fadf6e1a-1269"][vc_column_text]The fulfillment address is your shipping address. If you have an international address, it is very helpful if you rewrite your address in the Special Instructions field during check out.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Can you ship your products anywhere?" tab_id="1502047888742-a8933511-54ce"][vc_column_text]Yes! However, we are not responsible for additional charges you may incur as a result of international duties.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="What methods of payment do you accept?" tab_id="1502048611127-57b34541-ff77"][vc_column_text]We accept PayPal and all major American credit card brands.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How do I cancel an order or return an item?" tab_id="1502048685873-4ee0029f-ce40"][vc_column_text]E-mail us at yourcompany@email.net, letting us know that you will be returning an item. Then, ship the item with your receipt to 67 Mt. Please include in this shipment your personal information that you used to make the order. Our policy typically is that, for domestic returns, you as the customer will pay for shipping back to us, but we'll refund the cost of shipping that we originally charged you. This is to help streamline the process and avoid having to exchange money for the purpose of refunding items. Chairs, lamps, frames, rings, and sale items are not eligible for return. For more details and info regarding in store returns, see our refund/exchange policy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How do I proceed through the check out process?" tab_id="1502047711384-41b43ca6-6661"][vc_column_text]Once you have finished adding items to your Shopping Bag, simply click the “Check Out” button on the Shopping Bag page and we will guide you through the check out process.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="All Question is dummy purpose demo theme?" tab_id="1502048867588-c98b30a8-4844"][vc_column_text]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur non porttitor diam. Sed sit amet luctus turpis. Curabitur nec diam libero. Vivamus fringilla purus eget lacus placerat, ut facilisis arcu imperdiet. Suspendisse vel lacus vitae est condimentum efficitur. Proin vestibulum vitae nibh in porttitor. Nullam rutrum leo vitae arcu varius faucibus. Pellentesque vitae ex scelerisque, mollis nisl sit amet, cursus massa.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" el_class="remove-footer-spacing"][vc_column][pikoworks_newsletter subscribe_form_title="" mc_shortcode="`{`contact-form-7 id=``4439`` title=``Subscribe Form```}`" subscribe_img_id="5060"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
